SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldDeck, ResourceDeck, StartingDeck
public abstract class Deck extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class that handles all the methods of all kinds of deck in the game. It implements Serializable because through serialization is possible to transmit objects between different machines in a network.
See Also:

    A boolean of the ack to let us know when the deck is empty, obviously i the beginning it will be false because the deck should be full.
